speaker: Alex
text: *Looking at Mary with a curious expression* So, Mary, what are your dreams for the future?

speaker: Mary
text: *Smiles softly and looks into the distance* Well, first and foremost, I want to follow Jesus wherever He leads. But if I had a say, I'd love to be a loving mother and wife one day. I want to be surrounded with people that I love, and who love me. And I want to find work doing something that truly matters.

speaker: Alex
text: *Taken aback, he takes a moment to respond* Wow, that's... that's really beautiful, Mary. You've got such a lovely heart. You know, I'm sure you'll achieve all of it.

speaker: Mary
text: *Gives Alex a soft look* What about you, Alex? What are your dreams for the future?

speaker: Alex
text: *Looks at Mary sincerely* I want to live a life that would make Victoria proud. A life of love and purpose. I want to be a loving husband and father one day, and have a successful career where my work makes a real difference. In a way... our dreams for the future are very compatible, don't you think?

speaker: Mary
text: *Blushes slightly, smiles* Yes, they really are. Who knows what the future holds, right?
